scripts.pod-install: cd ios && USE_HERMES=1 RCT_NEW_ARCH_ENABLED=1 pod install
scripts.build:android: npm run mkdist && react-native bundle --entry-file index.js --platform android --dev false --bundle-output dist/main.android.jsbundle --assets-dest dist/res
scripts.build:ios: npm run mkdist && react-native bundle --entry-file index.js --platform ios --dev false --bundle-output dist/main.ios.jsbundle --assets-dest dist
scripts.test:ios:build: xcodebuild -workspace ios/PhotoManipulatorExample.xcworkspace -scheme PhotoManipulatorExample -configuration Release -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build
scripts.test:ios:run: xcrun simctl install Booted ios/build/Build/Products/Release-iphonesimulator/ReactTestApp.app && maestro test .maestro
